name: Lost Bot
description:
In a world where ruled paper makes up the skies, and trees share the same breeding grounds as conveyor belts, one robot must make its way home... What is home? Well, why don't we find out, with our little friend, Beep?

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #35

You can click and drag with your mouse to look around.

If you experience audio issues, try downloading a build for your operating system.

On some browsers, the clipboard will not work properly. If you want to copy/paste level codes, either use Firefox, or download a build for your operating system.

On macOS, you will need to run this command for the game to work:

    xattr -cr /path/to/application.app
